description: STEP 4 VALIDATE tool. Counts cross-papers between two categories to verify existence of prior bridges. The agent additionally runs platform.core.execute_esql for categories LIKE pattern matching to check cross-listed papers. Fewer cross-papers indicate a more novel discovery.

configuration.query: FROM ti-papers | WHERE primary_category IN (?category_a, ?category_b) | STATS total = COUNT(*) BY primary_category

category_a.description: First arXiv category to validate. Example: 'q-bio.NC'

category_b.description: Second arXiv category to validate. Example: 'cs.AI'
